overview: Cat with no Name is a short 15 minute long film, animated and produced by Antonio Costa Valente and Cineclube de Avanca the financial support of ICA and the executive production of Smarty Cool Studios , directed by Charlie Blue, The short movie was based on a book written by Natércia Rocha known for her great works, the author has left us with a vast collection of children’s literature. The original music is composed by musician Nik Phelps.  The story revolves around a girl named Claudia who is about to celebrate her birthday when inside her awakens a strange curiosity of wanting to become a fly, to hear her parents’ thoughts, like this she could find out just exactly what she would be receiving on her birthday.  The short film with many awards at various festivals worldwide.

production_companies.name: Instituto do Cinema, Audiovisual e Multimédia (ICAM)

title: a cat without a name
